availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hubbard Dozier Helm (Campbell County, Kentucky, sheriff and real estate dealer)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Stanton Tarvin Helm. Father of Florence Helm, Frank Helm, Susan Helm, Mary Helm, Edwin Helm, and Lulie Helm. Sheriff in Campbell County in 1860. Real estate dealer in Campbell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 551.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Dayton, p. 221B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 6th Congressional District, Vol. 3, June & July 1863, p. 107, p. 215 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on May 29, 2020).
National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution, Lineage Book, Washington, D.C. : NSDAR, 1891-1939, Vol 17: 1904, 55.
Find A Grave, "Hubbard Dozier Helm (1821-1885)," Memorial 73157907, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/73157907 (accessed May 27, 2020).
